about_the_game:
Hunter Project: Operation Survive is a top-down action shooter that puts you in the shoes of an agent tasked to go to Earth and make a dent in the infestation called the "Hive". You and a few other members are alive. Abandoned by the government.

Storyline

Cleaner 159 gets assigned to Alpha team after months of trauma from his previous mission. His squad is part of Operation 'Sweeping Rhino'. This operation was meant to make a dent or even clear the infection out on Earth so that the planet could be habitable for humanity to return. 159's team gets wiped when setting off an alarm system. Squadmate after squadmate, devoured by the infected. Leaving him and two others alive inside the facility, left to fend for themselves.

Key Features

  • Story
    Play as an Agent trying to make ends meet with his team and a couple of survivors

  • Survival
    The infected population is unknown hence you are destined to fail. Survive as long as you can.

  • Expeditions
    Go with a team in a vast and open field, complete tasks while fighting a rogue organization and the infection while encountering survivors.

  • Unique maps
    Go from science labs to cities, and play through big open areas to survive or explore.

  • Call in 'Support Calls' to help you on your journey
    Call in special items, equipment, or explosives using unique codes to give you an advantage.

  • Weapons of choice
    Use different weapons to fight the horde of zombies and hope you don't run out of ammo.

content_descriptors.notes: Warning: This game contains strong language, extreme violence, and mature themes and contents

name: Hunter Project: Operation Survive

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7
  • Processor: 1GHz processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1600x900
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 10
  • Processor: 3GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080 (full HD 1080p)

short_description: Hunter Project: Operation Survive is an action top-down shooter with the goal of survival. You are a member of the Cleaner Containment Regiment. You are tasked to go to Earth and fight off the infection as well as save lives and gather data. Do what you must to survive.
